Canada parliament to vote on motion backing Palestinian statehoodCanadian legislators are due on Monday to vote on a non-binding motion backing Palestinian statehood that has drawn condemnation from Israel and that could deepen splits inside the ruling Liberal Party. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:18:00 GMT CN2SO74SM5N75CE3S74MDLEDNI https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-parliament-vote-motion-backing-palestinian-statehood-2024-03-18/David Ljunggren世界
Croatian President Milanovic barred for running for PM while still in postCroatia's Constitutional Court on Monday barred President Zoran Milanovic from running for prime minister in elections next month while still in office and said he would have to resign first. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:16:52 GMT PHT3XP5YNZNKPPAYZXHU4QOH6I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/croatian-president-milanovic-barred-running-pm-while-still-post-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine says Putin's buffer zone comment is clear sign of looming escalationA senior Ukrainian official said on Monday Russian President Vladimir Putin's idea of creating a buffer zone inside Ukrainian territory was a clear indication that Moscow planned to escalate its war in neighbouring Ukraine. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:14:36 GMT 5SZ5TDUGRFIP5DWA4KCLS6VX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-putins-buffer-zone-comment-is-clear-sign-looming-escalation-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
US study finds no evidence of Havana syndrome brain injuryA U.S. government research team found no significant evidence of brain injury among a group of federal employees reporting symptoms of the "Havana syndrome" ailment that emerged in 2016, according to studies published in a medical journal on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 14:06:46 GMT 7EOCBSJXWZMPFBV27DSCRRWFFA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-study-finds-no-evidence-havana-syndrome-brain-injury-2024-03-18/Deena Beasley世界美国
Russians vote for Putin must be accepted, Italy's Salvini saysItalian Deputy Prime Minister Matteo Salvini distanced himself on Monday from Western leaders' critical response to Vladimir Putin's landslide victory in Russia's presidential election, saying the voters' verdict must be accepted. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:57:55 GMT CUZOJ754GJLJ5OOUF4HURGIP7E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russians-vote-putin-must-be-accepted-italys-salvini-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden, Israel's Netanyahu to speak on Monday, source saysU.S. President Joe Biden will speak to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday, according to a person familiar with the matter, after relations were strained further by criticism from the top Senate Democrat. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:51:00 GMT VFGWWX7CGZOCLDCITEGJ7RKK3I https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-israels-netanyahu-expected-speak-monday-report-says-2024-03-18/Trevor Hunnicutt, Doina Chiacu世界
Gaza suffers famine-level shortages, mass death imminent, UN-backed monitor saysFood shortages in parts of the Gaza Strip have already far exceeded famine levels, and mass death is now imminent without an immediate ceasefire and surge of food into areas cut off by fighting, the global hunger monitor said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:49:05 GMT W4R23JE5EZIJTCXBI3DAK5YSBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-suffers-famine-level-shortages-mass-death-imminent-un-backed-monitor-says-2024-03-18/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams, Aidan Lewis世界中东
US Supreme Court won't hear New Mexico official's appeal of insurrection ousterThe U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to hear an ousted New Mexico county commissioner's challenge to judicial rulings that made him the first person to be disqualified from office under a constitutional provision regarding insurrection for taking part in the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:39:34 GMT OJ3NOYXFVJPBBHMJZTRPJDPNEM https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-supreme-court-wont-hear-new-mexico-officials-appeal-insurrection-ouster-2024-03-18/John Kruzel合法的美国最高法院
Australian regulator demands social media firms disclose anti-terrorism effortsAn Australian regulator has sent legal letters to social media platforms from YouTube, X and Facebook to Telegram and Reddit, demanding they hand over information about their efforts to stamp out terrorism content. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 13:18:28 GMT RITIRFOMLVJHNDLLUAYSNIZ2M https://www.reuters.com/technology/australian-regulator-demands-social-media-firms-disclose-anti-errors-efforts-2024-03-18/Byron Kaye技术
Seven bodies found in Petion-Ville, HaitiSeven bodies were found in Petion Ville in the Ouest Department of Haiti, a Reuters source on site said, confirming earlier media reports. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:52:11 GMT U5PFOG5YUZKF7IS4QQ6HGTAQDM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/seven-bodies-found-petion-ville-haiti-2024-03-18/Reuters世界美洲
Independent Russian vote monitor says election was a mockeryAn independent Russian vote monitoring group said on Monday that the presidential election that Vladimir Putin won in a landslide with nearly 90% of the vote was the most fraudulent and corrupt in the country's history. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 12:15:22 GMT EPX2THP2NZPXPBKMMSJI4OPPCE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/independent- Russian-vote-monitor-says-election-was-mockery-2024-03-18/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
